forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 5C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
